reviews.comment: This is one of the best tution center one can be in. It's not only about studies here it's also about fun and games and outdoor activities that makes maths, a subject that many people don't like.. really interesting and fun. I myself have been in this tution centre for 3 consecutive years and it has taught me a lot. From behaviour, manners to team spirit ..and coordination and a lot more... It was indeed a memorable experience for me . And the teacher here is amazing. She is one of the best teachers I have come across. I feel really honoured that I could be a part of tution center like this.
